Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection was secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside was posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still-smoldering NDP headquarters. And there was the wry self-knowledge of saying that when the "spokesman needed a spokesman", it was time to go. Monday afternoon Senate Democrats sent out a message noting that Ryan's Roadmap has now been endorsed by the House Majority Leader and the top Republicans on both the House and Senate budget committees. Democrats are aware that any proposal to adjust entitlement programs is a politically charged issue for members of both parties-and a shrewd political move is to link entitlement cuts to members of the opposing party.

Meanwhile, Sergio Marchionne also said Fiat will not consider selling its Alfa Romeo brand to Volkswagen AG. VW Chairman Ferdinand Piech has indicated an interest in buying Alfa from Fiat Group. But Sergio Marchionne said: As long as I am CEO of Chrysler and Fiat, Mr. Ferdinand Piech will never have Alfa Romeo. It's hands-off. I told him. I will call him and I will e-mail him.
